## `safira-cli argocd config-repo`

Help you configure the GIT repository for your ArgoCD project

```
USAGE
  $ safira-cli argocd config-repo

DESCRIPTION
  Help you configure the GIT repository for your ArgoCD project

EXAMPLES
  $ safira-cli argocd config-repo
```
